item.description:
One of our members, Marleny, will host February's fiesta at Cora Cora, a Peruvian restaurant in West Hartford.

Details:

When: Tuesday 2/17/09 7:00 pm

Where: Cora Cora restaurant 162 Shield Street, West Hartford, CT 06110
860-953-2672

Cost: 15 dollars per person, including appetizers, choice of main
dish and dessert!

We need to make reservations in advance, so there is no 'maybe' option for this event.

More details: There will be music and salsa dancing at this venue. We might even have a presentation on Peru including the country's tourist attractions. It should be a great time! Hope to see many of you there. :) Jill

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: February fiesta
